title: In Eternity
lyrics:
I fell in love, in love with you a million times
Your clothes, your hair and the sweetest of smiles
We'll never see, see the like of you again
A master of pleasure and a master of pain
Dark is a way

Light is a place



Close the curtains in L.A

Open them up on a Berlin day

Self-made and self-realised

Always ready to disguise



In eternity

In death as in life

In eternity

The king and queen of style



There is no journey, no start and no ending

We all still arrive and keep on departing

You place a light on a different universe

Made life better with the wonder of your words



Dark is a way

Light is a place



Close the curtains in L.A

Open them up on a Berlin day

Self-made and self-realised

Always ready to disguise



In eternity

In death as in life

In eternity

The king and queen of...

Open them up on a Berlin day

Self-made and self-realised

Always ready to disguise



In eternity

As death as in life

In eternity

The king and queen of style

Open them up on a Berlin day
